job.title: Machine Learning Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongDescriptionstrongppHEALTHatSCALE is a rapidly growing postSeries A healthcare machine intelligence startup founded by machine learning and clinical faculty with strong ties to MIT Stanford Harvard and UMichigan The company has been recognized for its efforts by Forbes Beckers UCSF Digital Health Awards Bloomberg TechCrunch and MIT News Our mission is to bring precision delivery to healthcare through cuttingedge machine learning and artificial intelligence that can predictively match the worlds patients to the right treatments by the right providers at the right times HEALTHatSCALEs machine intelligence platform and applications for care prediction are among the largest deployments to date of machine learning technologies for healthcare helping leading organizations manage tens of millions of individuals in live production use The companys software solutions service a broad range of use cases for managed care accountable care and selfinsured organizations including early targeted prediction and prevention of adverse outcomes optimizing care planning and guiding effective treatment refining and navigating provider networks and reducing fraud waste and abuse For more information please visit ournbspwebsiteppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliDesign and implement new predictive machine learning and artificial intelligence technologiesliliEngineer machine intelligence systems and infrastructure for realworld production use at scaleliliImprove the accuracy runtime scalability and reliability of machine intelligence systemsliliDevelop and implement machine intelligence platform APIs for multiple usecasesliliDrive architecture of platform and application capabilities embedding machine intelligenceliliBuild and enhance data pipelines and data warehouses for machine intelligenceliliWork crossfunctionally with other teams to provide engineering leadership to complex projectsliulpbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliBS MS or PhD in Computer Science or related technical fieldlili2 years of experience with data analytics and machine learning in academia or industryliliStrong understanding of the foundational concepts of machine learning and artificial intelligenceliliStrong proficiency in Python and cloud computing environmentsliliIndepth knowledge and experience with distributed systems relational databases NoSQLliliFamiliarity with data technology stack eg Hadoop Spark Hive HDFS TensorFlow PyTorch etcliliExcellent communication
